title: How to Silence a Dripping Tap Overnight

steps.headline: Find a piece of string.
steps.description: It should be long enough to reach from the tap to the drain.

steps.headline: Tie the piece of string to the tap.
Adjust the string so that it falls into the drain.
steps.description: The drips will run straight down the string, silently, and into the drain. You can enjoy a good night's rest and call the plumber first thing in the morning.

text: Locate the dripping tap.  Find a piece of string. It should be long enough to reach from the tap to the drain. Tie the piece of string to the tap.  Adjust the string so that it falls into the drain. The drips will run straight down the string, silently, and into the drain. You can enjoy a good night's rest and call the plumber first thing in the morning.
